item.title: [PI] If player Logs out
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:9, topic:463536”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=567031.msg4121432#msg4121432 date=1349782493]

edit

if (playerIsWielding(123, 1) {
playerCanNotUnWield item until timer reaches 0.

This would go in itemassistant

if (wearID == 9999) {
if (timer > 0) {
c.sendMessage("You can't wield this yet");
return;
}
//rest here
}

[/quote]

public void lol() { if (wearID == 9999 && timer > 0) { c.sendMessage("You can't wield this yet"); return; } //rest here } }[/quote]

this…and win ahaha one code is much easier on the mind

item.title: [PI] If player Logs out
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:



edit
[code=java]
if (playerIsWielding(123, 1) {
playerCanNotUnWield item until timer reaches 0.
[/code]

This would go in itemassistant
[code=java]
if (wearID == 9999) {
if (timer > 0) {
c.sendMessage("You can't wield this yet");
return;
}
//rest here
}
[/code]

edit

if (playerIsWielding(123, 1) {
playerCanNotUnWield item until timer reaches 0.

This would go in itemassistant

if (wearID == 9999) {
if (timer > 0) {
c.sendMessage("You can't wield this yet");
return;
}
//rest here
}

item.title: [PI] If player Logs out
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

[quote=“Da Vein, post:1, topic:463536”]How would I make this into code?:

If (playerLogsOut = true) { c.getItems().deleteItem(123, 1) }
[size=24pt]and[/size]

if (playerIsWielding(123, 1) { playerCanNotUnWield item until timer reaches 0.

Any help is really appreciated.[/quote]
I need a snippet code of how to make it to where when you logout a item that you’re wearing disappears… (deletes)
Then I need to make it to where, after you wield a item, you cannot take it back off until Timer = 0;…
(Sorry if my post was unclear.)

item.title: [PI] If player Logs out
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Da Vein, post:1, topic:463536”]How would I make this into code?:

If (playerLogsOut = true) { c.getItems().deleteItem(123, 1) }
[size=24pt]and[/size]

if (playerIsWielding(123, 1) { playerCanNotUnWield item until timer reaches 0.

Any help is really appreciated.[/quote]

  1. Declare a new variable for your timer.
  2. When the player equips the item set the timer value and make the timer run. (task/event system recommended else dump it in process)
  3. In your logout method add the deleting of the item (or unequipping I suppose it the player is wearing it)

optional: also add step 3 in player initialization since it’s possible that some one doesn’t use the logout button.

Read full topic
